scripts.build: prisma migrate dev --schema=../../packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema=../../packages/db/prisma/schema.prisma && npx esbuild ./src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.js
scripts.dev: npx esbuild ./src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --outfile=dist/index.js && npm run build && npm run start
